relationships.evidence_text: Welcome to the Y on Earth Community Podcast. I'm your host, Aaron William Perry.
And today have the distinct pleasure to introduce and host one of my personal heroes and incredible historian sociologist and futurist Dr. Rianne Eisler.
Rianne, it's so great to have you here. It's wonderful to be with you.
I'm really excited about our conversation and about sharing with our audience some of the incredible writings that you've provided our world over the last few decades.
